recipesJson.name: AntDick Pie
recipesJson.author: BeardedFolk
recipesJson.description: Strawberries and vanilla cream, slapped in a graham cracker crust! Named after my brother-in-law, Anthony Richard, who loves this stuff!

reviews.text: This reminded me how good TFA strawberry ripe can be on its own in a proper mix.  Some mixes need a bolstered, complex berry...some are like this and can be carried quite well with a simpler main note.  Tip o' the hat for this one.
